test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:08 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:subtract-dayTimeDurations" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-2 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:08 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:subtract-dayTimeDurations" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(mid range) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT11H59M59S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-3 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:08 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:subtract-dayTimeDurations" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P31DT23H59M59S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-4
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-4 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:08 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:subtract-dayTimeDurations" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(mid range) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P15DT11H59M59S")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-5
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations2args-5 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: Tue Apr 12 16:29:08 GMT-05:00 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "op:subtract-dayTimeDurations" operator with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:dayTimeDuration(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:dayTimeDuration(upper bound) *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P0DT0H0M0S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P31DT23H59M59S")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-1 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function As per example 1 (for this function)of the F&O specs. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P2DT12H") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P1DT10H30M")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-2 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The string value of "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used as part of a boolean expression (and operator) and the "fn:false" function. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:string(xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT10H11M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P12DT10H07M")) and fn:false()

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-3 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function as part of a boolean expression (or operator) and the "fn:boolean" function. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:string(xs:dayTimeDuration("P20DT20H10M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P19DT13H10M")) or fn:false()

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-4
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-4 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function that return true and used together with fn:not. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:not(fn:string(xs:dayTimeDuration("P11DT12H04M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P02DT07H01M")))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-5
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-5 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function that is used as an argument to the fn:boolean function. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:boolean(fn:string(xs:dayTimeDuration("P05DT09H08M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P03DT08H06M")))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-6 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" operator that is used as an argument to the fn:number function. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:number(xs:dayTimeDuration("P02DT06H09M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT08H01M"))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-7
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-7 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used as an argument to the "fn:string" function). *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:string(xs:dayTimeDuration("P03DT04H08M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P01DT09H02M"))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-8
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-8 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function that returns a negative value. *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT01H01M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P11DT02H02M"))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-9
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-9 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with and "and" expression. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:string((xs:dayTimeDuration("P01DT02H01M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P02DT09H02M"))) and fn:string((xs:dayTimeDuration("P02DT03H03M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P04DT04H04M")))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-10
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-10 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with an "or" expression. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:string((xs:dayTimeDuration("P05DT09H02M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P03DT01H04M"))) or fn:string((xs:dayTimeDuration("P05DT05H03M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P01DT01H03M")))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-11
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-11 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with a "div" expression. *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P42DT10H10M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT10H10M")) div (xs:dayTimeDuration("P20DT10H10M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P18DT10H10M"))

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-12
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-12 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" operators used with a boolean expression and the "fn:true" function. *******************************************************
test-case.test: fn:string((xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT08H11M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P05DT08H11M"))) and (fn:true())

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-13
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-13 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with the numeric-equal-operator "eq". *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P23DT11H11M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P23DT11H11M")) eq xs:dayTimeDuration("P23DT11H11M")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-14
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-14 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with the numeric-equal operator "ne". *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P21DT08H12M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P08DT08H05M")) ne xs:dayTimeDuration("P08DT08H05M")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-15
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-15 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with the numeric-equal operator "le". *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P10DT10H01M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P17DT10H02M")) le xs:dayTimeDuration("P17DT10H02M")

test-case.name: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-16
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: op-subtract-dayTimeDurations-16 Written By: Carmelo Montanez Date: June 29, 2005 Purpose: Evaluates The "subtract-dayTimeDurations" function used together with the numeric-equal operator "ge". *******************************************************
test-case.test: (xs:dayTimeDuration("P13DT09H09M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P18DT02H02M")) ge xs:dayTimeDuration("P18DT02H02M")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-1 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of substraction an xs:dayTimeDuration with PT0S. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT4H3M3.100S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("PT0S") eq xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT4H3M3.100S")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-2 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of substraction PT0S with an xs:dayTimeDuration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("PT0S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT4H3M3.100S") eq xs:dayTimeDuration("-P3DT4H3M3.100S")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-3
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-3 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Simple test of substraction two arbitrary xs:dayTimeDurations. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("PT0S") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P3DT4H3M3.100S") eq xs:dayTimeDuration("-P3DT4H3M3.100S")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-4
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-4 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: The substraction operator is not available between xs:dayTimeDuration and xs:yearMonthDuration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P3D") - xs:yearMonthDuration("P3Y3M")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-5
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-5 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: The substraction operator is not available between xs:yearMonthDuration and xs:dayTimeDuration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:yearMonthDuration("P3Y3M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P3D")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-6
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-6 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: The substraction operator is not available between xs:duration and xs:yearMonthDuration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:duration("P3D") - xs:yearMonthDuration("P3Y3M")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-7
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-7 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: The substraction operator is not available between xs:yearMonthDuration and xs:duration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:yearMonthDuration("P3Y3M") - xs:duration("P3D")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-8
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-8 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: The substraction operator is not available between xs:dayTimeDuration and xs:duration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:dayTimeDuration("P3D") - xs:duration("P3Y3M")

test-case.name: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-9
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K-DayTimeDurationSubtract-9 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: The substraction operator is not available between xs:duration and xs:dayTimeDuration. *******************************************************
test-case.test: xs:duration("P3Y3M") - xs:dayTimeDuration("P3D")

test-case.name: K2-DayTimeDurationSubtract-1
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K2-DayTimeDurationSubtract-1 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Ensure that a value from current-time() can be extracted. *******************************************************
test-case.test: (current-time() - xs:dayTimeDuration("PT3H")) ne current-time()

test-case.name: K2-DayTimeDurationSubtract-2
test-case.description: ******************************************************* Test: K2-DayTimeDurationSubtract-2 Written by: Frans Englich Date: 2007-11-22T11:31:21+01:00 Purpose: Ensure that a value from current-dateTime() can be extracted. *******************************************************
test-case.test: (current-dateTime() - xs:dayTimeDuration("PT3H")) lt current-dateTime()

test-case.name: cbcl-subtract-dayTimeDurations-001
test-case.description: test subtraction of zero duration from dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1) - xs:dayTimeDuration("P0D")

test-case.name: cbcl-subtract-dayTimeDurations-002
test-case.description: test subtraction of dayTimeDurations
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1) - local:dayTimeDuration(1, 1)

test-case.name: cbcl-subtract-dayTimeDurations-003
test-case.description: test subtraction of large dayTimeDuration
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer, $hours as xs:integer ) { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat('P', $days, 'DT', $hours, 'H')) }; xs:dayTimeDuration("-P5000000000000000000D") - local:dayTimeDuration(5000000000000000000, 1)

test-case.name: cbcl-minus-001
test-case.description: Test behaviour of minus operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; xs:date("1997-01-01") - local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-minus-002
test-case.description: Test behaviour of minus operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; xs:date("1997-01-01") - local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-minus-003
test-case.description: Test behaviour of minus operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:date("1997-01-01") - local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-minus-004
test-case.description: Test behaviour of minus operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:date("1997-01-01") - local:f(true())

test-case.description: Test behaviour of minus operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; xs:dateTime("1997-01-01T12:00:00") - local:f(false())

test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; xs:dateTime("1997-01-01T12:00:00") - local:f(true())

test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:time("12:00:00") - local:f(false())

test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1H") }; xs:time("12:00:00") - local:f(true())

test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") - local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-minus-034
test-case.description: Test behaviour of minus operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; declare function local:g($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(true()) - local:g(true())
